:py:mod:`rhino_health.lib.constants`
====================================

.. py:module:: rhino_health.lib.constants

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Constants that are used in the rest of the system

   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   rhino_health.lib.constants.ApiEnvironment




.. py:class:: ApiEnvironment

   
   Which environment you are hitting. By default you should be using PROD_API_URL













   .. rubric:: Examples

   >>> from rhino_health import ApiEnvironment.LOCALHOST_API_URL, ApiEnvironment.DEV_URL, ApiEnvironment.PROD_API_URL, ApiEnvironment.DEMO_DEV_URL



   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!
   .. py:attribute:: LOCALHOST_API_URL
      :annotation: = http://localhost:8080/api/

      
















      ..
          !! processed by numpydoc !!

   .. py:attribute:: DEV_URL
      :annotation: = https://dev.rhinohealth.com/api/

      
















      ..
          !! processed by numpydoc !!

   .. py:attribute:: DEMO_DEV_URL
      :annotation: = https://demo-dev.rhinohealth.com/api/

      
















      ..
          !! processed by numpydoc !!

   .. py:attribute:: PROD_API_URL
      :annotation: = https://prod.rhinohealth.com/api/

      
















      ..
          !! processed by numpydoc !!
